Title: Davido to perform at AFCON 2025 opening concert in Morocco
Summary: Grammy-nominated singer David Adeleke confirmed as one of the headline acts for AFCON 2025 opening concert . Davido will perform at the opening concert of the TotalEnergies Africa Cup of Nations 2025 in Rabat, Morocco .

Title: Arms allegation: APC stalwart urges Tinubu to probe Ribadu, Kwara Gov
Summary: Comrade Timi Frank urged President Bola Ahmed Tinubu to launch an independent investigation into allegations against National Security Adviser Mallam Nuhu Ribadu and Kwara State Gov.

Title: I don’t mind if AI can perform for me – Asake
Summary: Nigerian music stars Wizkid and Asake have shared their thoughts on artificial intelligence and its growing role in the creative industry . The clip, which has gone viral, showed the duo speaking casually about the growing role of AI .

Title: Kano unveils Cycling Kano 2025 Jersey ahead of Saturday’s event
Summary: Kano State Government unveils official jersey for forthcoming Cycling Kano 2025 event . The event is scheduled to take place on Saturday, December 20 . The ceremony was held on Wednesday at the office of the Senior Special Adviser to the State .

Title: Ariya Networks secures AFCON broadcast rights
Summary: Ariya Networks has secured the rights to broadcast the Africa Cup of Nations (AFCON) in Nigeria . The move is a major step for the newly launched broadcasting and streaming platform as it enters the African sports media space .

Title: Liverpool have ‘moved on’ from Salah furore, says upbeat Slot
Summary: Liverpool have "moved on" from furore caused by Mohamed Salah's outburst at being dropped . Arne Slot says Liverpool are showing signs of growing into the side he wants to see .

Title: ‘No fear’ as safety concerns shadow Paul vs Joshua clash
Summary: Joshua said the fight was less about boxing tradition and more about creating conversation . Paul said he has 'no fear' as safety concerns shadow Paul vs Joshua clash .

Title: INEC wades into PDP leadership crisis, summons factions
Summary: INEC has summoned the two warring factions of PDP for a troubleshooting meeting at the Commission's headquarters in Abuja . INEC wades into PDP leadership crisis, summons factions .

Title: Putin hails Ukraine gains, threatens more, in annual press conference
Summary: Putin hails Ukraine gains, threatens more, in annual press conference . "Our troops are advancing along the entire line of contact... the enemy is retreating in all directions," Putin said . Putin said at the set-piece event shown on big screens across Russian cities .

Title: NFVCB seeks title change for ‘A Very Dirty Christmas’ after CAN’s complaint
Summary: CAN also expressed concerns that the film title passed through the official scrutiny and approval of the NFVCB, the regulatory body of the nation’s motion picture industry, for public exhibition .

Title: Police arrest teenagers over fake kidnap, N1.7m extortion in Lagos
Summary: Lagos State Police Command has arrested five suspects in connection with a staged kidnapping incident that went viral last month, involving a schoolboy pleading for mercy in a purported kidnappers’ den . The incident, initially reported as a missing person case, was later revealed to be orchestrated by the victim, 15-year-old Victor Alig

Title: Plateau APC welcomes gov Mutfwang, pledges support
Summary: The All Progressives Congress on Thursday announced the defection of Plateau State Governor, Caleb Mutfwang, from the Peoples Democratic Party to the ruling party . The announcement was made by the APC National Chairman, Prof. Nentawe Yilwatda, during the party’s 14th National Caucus meeting held at

Title: Flights cancelled, roads flooded as rare storm soaks UAE
Summary: UAE airport authorities cancelled or delayed dozens of flights and roads were flooded in major cities as the heaviest rainstorm in months lashed the desert nation on Friday . Dubai’s Emirates airline axed 13 flights on Friday and there were also delays and cancellations at neighbouring Sharjah's airport after the overnight downpour, which woke residents with lightning

Title: NIMC unveils digital pre-enrolment for faster identity registration
Summary: The National Identity Management Commission (NIMC) has introduced a Pre-Enrolment Portal to allow applicants to securely submit their details, upload required documents, and schedule appointments before biometric capture . NIMC said the portal is designed to reduce waiting times at enrolment centres, improve data accuracy, and ensure a smoother registration experience

Title: US proposes ban on gender surgeries for minors
Summary: The US Department of Health and Human Services has announced a series of proposed regulatory actions to implement President Trump’s Executive Order directing HHS to end the practice of sex-rejecting procedures on children . These procedures include pharmaceutical or surgical interventions intended to align a child's physical appearance or body with an asserted identity different from their sex .
